message: I'm being generous this first round, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Let's be fair, Alice. I'm hurting from inflation here!
I'm still being generous, Bob. But I'm not sure how much longer I can keep this up with inflation hitting you so hard.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I need a larger share to make this worthwhile, and this is my final offer.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise, but this is my last offer before the inflation really starts to bite us both.
